education.institution: Inha University, Incheon, Republic of Korea
courses: Thesis: Development of Braille Translator Using Deep learning-Based Braille Recognition Model (Advisor: Sungeun Hong)

publications.name: Research on Autonomous Bus Passenger Recognition Algorithm
publications.publisher: Journal of the Korean Society for Railway
publications.summary: This paper studies the technology needed to recognize boarding passengers in autonomous buses and determine completion of boarding. By utilizing CCTV cameras installed in buses and deep learning-based vision technology, we recognize boarding passengers and use this information to determine boarding completion.

work.name: AI & Media (AIM) Lab., Inha University

work.name: Student Major Mentor Group, Inha University
work.summary: Served as a department guide and career mentor for high school students.

awards.title: 정보통신 종합설계 최우수설계상
awards.summary: In the spring semester of 2023, in the Capstone Design course offered by the Department of Information and Communication Engineering, I designed an excellent project titled <Braille Translator Using a Deep Learning-Based Braille Recognition Model>. The project was successfully demonstrated during the final presentation and received an award.

projects.name: Development of high-occupancy BRT passenger recognition technology
projects.summary: Development of vision-based passenger boarding and alighting completion detection technology.
